scripts.build: mkdir dist; npm run build-standard; npm run build-min
scripts.build-standard: mkdir dist; browserify index.js --standalone WalletCryptoUtils > dist/wallet-crypto-utils.js
scripts.build-min: mkdir dist; browserify index.js --standalone WalletCryptoUtils | uglifyjs > dist/wallet-crypto-utils.min.js
scripts.version: git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/ && git commit -am "Update dist for release"
scripts.release:patch: npm run build; npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run build; npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run build; npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
